channel.description: Does anyone know how to make a npc shout/talk on a delta 317 base?

item.title: [317 Delta]Shouting Npc
item.dc:creator: @deathbyu deathbyu
item.description:
@deathbyu wrote:

[quote=“king gauge, post:4, topic:343584”][quote author=I Vain I link=topic=439974.msg3233119#msg3233119 date=1276257296]
Think it’s in NPCHandler.java
[/quote]
Right there is where you will add it. If you look down the page it should show up with some others like that. If not, than you should be able to find it in the search.[/quote]

well my server doesent have anybody talking in it so could u please tell me whats above this code?
if (npcs[i].npcType == 1552) { //Npc ID!
if (misc.random2(10) <= 3) //time delay, time between they say your shout text.
{
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdate = “your text here that will be shouted :)”;
}
}

please please please?

Read full topic

item.title: [317 Delta]Shouting Npc

item.description:
@king_gauge wrote:

I Vain I:

Think it’s in NPCHandler.java

Right there is where you will add it. If you look down the page it should show up with some others like that. If not, than you should be able to find it in the search.

item.title: [317 Delta]Shouting Npc
item.dc:creator: @Fall Fall
item.description:
@Fall wrote:

[quote=“tehcow, post:2, topic:343584”]It’s in NPCHandler for sure, wait Ill get you the code?

                   [code] if (npcs[i].npcType == 1552) { //Npc ID!
                    if (misc.random2(10) <= 3) //time delay, time between they say your shout text.
                    {
                        npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
                        npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
                            npcs[i].textUpdate = "your text here that will be shouted :)";
                        }
                    }

[/code]
Hmm I recoded that. Took me 10 mins

Ok it’s 100% :P[/quote]

Ok but where do i add that?

Read full topic

                   [code] if (npcs[i].npcType == 1552) { //Npc ID!
                    if (misc.random2(10) <= 3) //time delay, time between they say your shout text.
                    {
                        npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
                        npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
                            npcs[i].textUpdate = "your text here that will be shouted :)";
                        }

[/code]
